alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, southeastern Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chipley, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Bonifay, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Brock Crossroad, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill, Kynesville, Ridgetop, Steele City, Gilberts Mill, Round Lake, Cottondale Airport, Bahoma, Sunny Hills, Poplar Head and Richter Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
